transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello Javed ji, Namaskar.
Customer: Ji sir boliye, Namaskar sir.
Executive: Manish Sharma baat kar raha hun IndiaMART ke office se, aapka account manager.
Customer: Ji ji boliye sir.
Executive: Haan call kiya tha Javed ji customer care ke number pe.
Customer: Ji sir maine call kiya tha mere paas koi bhi inquiry nahi aa rahi.
Executive: Dekhiye inquiry matlab teen cheeze aapko aati hain ek buylead aati hain, ek inquiry aati hain, ek call aati hain aapko kaun si wali nahi aa rahi sir?
Customer: Mere paas na hi to call aa rahi hai.
Executive: Theek hai.
Customer: Ek aur koi bhi teen din se koi call hi nahi aa rahi.
Executive: Theek hai, chhoti chhoti wo hain correction required hai brother kyunki apna catalog jo hai IndiaMART pe naya hai to wo correction main abhi bata abhi bata du wo kar lenge aap?
Customer: Ji boliye sir.
Executive: Theek hai, abhi office mein hain aap?
Customer: Ji nahi main side pe hun.
Executive: Side pe hain, theek hai, ek na brother aapke account pe na retractable roof roof aa raha hai right?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: IndiaMART ka sabse pehle aap app open kariye.
Customer: Ek minute hold rahiye sir.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Ji boliye sir.
Executive: Retractable roof hai buylead wale page pe jaiye pehle buylead wale page pe jaiye jahan pe buylead aati hain.
Customer: Ji sir.
Executive: Jahan pe buylead aati hain daily basis pe Javed ji us page pe jaiye.
Customer: Usi page pe hun sir main.
Executive: Haan hai na theek hai ab right corner mein dekhiye na three dots hoga.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Wahan pe click kariye.
Customer: Ji kar diya sir.
Executive: Theek hai sabse neeche ya neeche se second dekhiye na ek jagah likha hoga buylead preference.
Customer: Sabse neeche hai.
Executive: Haan sabse neeche buylead preference pe click kariye.
Customer: Ji boliye sir.
Executive: Theek hai ab sabse pehle usme aapko ek aad do city ke naam aa rahi hain ya nahi?
Customer: Nahi sir mere paas koi kisi ka bhi nahi hai.
Executive: City ka naam nahi aa raha, koi dikkat nahi hai uske neeche scroll karenge na to dekh ek jagah likha hoga based on your buylead product.
Customer: Product ji sabse neeche likha hai.
Executive: Haan inside haan based on your product mein likha hoga tentile umbrella car parking system industrial shade likha hai na?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Aisa sab aur uske side aur neeche jayenge to likha hoga based on your buylead consumption.
Executive: Usme do do category hogi retractable roof hoga aur ek car shed hoga dikh raha hai aapko?
Customer: Ek minute to nahi dikh raha.
Executive: Aur neeche scroll kariye.
Customer: Sir ho hi nahi raha main kaha karun.
Executive: Aapko kya dikh raha hai wo padh ke sunaiye mujhe.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan Javed ji jo bhi dikh raha hai na wo ek baar padh ke mujhe bataiye main samajh jaunga aap kis page pe hain.
Customer: Industrial shade.
Executive: Ek kaam karta hun Javed ji.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Aap isi number se whatsapp chalate hain?
Customer: Ji ji.
Executive: Ek minute line hold kijiye na.
Executive: Ek baar apna whatsapp number repeat kijiye zara.
Customer: 93
Customer: 93
Customer: 0
Customer: 0
Customer: 67
Customer: 67
Customer: 7
Customer: 7
Customer: 67
Customer: 67 36 hoga.
Executive: Dekhiye 93067 itna yahan yahan ke baad bataiye.
Customer: 6
Customer: 6
Customer: 41
Customer: 41
Customer: 52
Customer: 52 ji.
Executive: Maine ek baar hi sir aapko likha tha aapne reply nahi diya tha dekhiye na maine aapko whatsapp pe hi sir ka ek message likha hai.
Customer: Abhi dekhta hun.
Executive: Haan net on kar lijiye aaya hai na us pe hi hello ka reply kar dijiye.
Customer: Ji main.
Customer: Ye dekho maine kar diya.
Executive: Ek minute sir.
Executive: Main na aapko ek chhoti si video meeting ki request is pe bhejunga sir aap join kijiyega fir aapko screen share karke main bataunga ki wo kya kahan pe kaise correction karna hai iske alawa kaun kaun sa cheez correction karke kaise kaise isko shuru mein aapko kaam karna hai ye sari cheeze main aapko update karwa deta hun theek hai shuruati initial stage hai na sir aap ye samajhiye ki naya naya business shuruat kiya hai to thoda sa jo struggling phase dikkat pareshaniya to aayengi ek baar smooth run ho na ho gaya na to aapko khud maza aane lagega isliye ghabrane ki baat nahi hai Javed ji ye sab ke sath hota hai.
Customer: Bas yahi hai main iska samadhan de raha hun.
Executive: Main iska samadhan de raha hun sir meri baat suno aap business mein investing kara to thoda bahut to wo karna padega.
Customer: Kya sir?
Customer: Sir jab business ke liye invest kiya to thoda bahut to bilkul bilkul janna janna padega samajhna padega time dena padega hai na sir ladna jhagadna padega yahan pe bilkul ji ab wo maine bheja bheja hai request ek baar join kijiye theek hai.
Customer: Theek hai ji.
Executive: Us pe click karenge na to ask ka join ka option aayega us pe click kijiyega.
Customer: Ji ji.
Executive: Ji kariye.
Customer: Bas bas main aapke baat samajh gaya.
Executive: Theek hai theek hai.
Executive: Click karne ke baad kya option aa raha hai Javed sir?
Customer: Ek minute ek minute aa gaya yahan pe aa gaya aa gaya aa gaya.
Executive: Theek hai ab na aap to apne screen pe dekhiye red button dikh raha hai?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Red button ke just left mein matlab baye taraf ek three teen bindi hogi sir teen bindi pe click kariye.
Customer: Chalo.
Executive: Haan wahan pe click kare honge to ek hath ka panja dikh raha hoga dikh raha hai aapka panja?
Customer: Hath ka panja nahi teer ka nishan hai.
Executive: Teer ka nishan hai na us pe click kariye.
Customer: Ho gaya.
Executive: Theek hai IndiaMART ka application back karke open kariye.
Customer: Ye dekho sir.
Executive: Ek minute.
Executive: Ek minute main check karta hun.
Executive: Haan ye neeche hai na dekhiye jaise upar se ye dekhiye tentile umbrella car parking system industrial shade modular tentile structure tentile structure fir iske neeche padhte padhte aayenge to swimming pool tentile cover aur fir steel dikha hai na?
Customer: Ji ji.
Executive: Uske neeche dekhiye based on your buylead consumption mein do do green green mein hai sir ek hai retractable roof hai aur ek hai car seat hai dikh rahi hai aapko?
Customer: Car seat sabse neeche hai.
Executive: Sabse neeche sabse neeche ji.
Executive: Pehle retractable roof ko cross kariye wahan se.
Customer: Isko?
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Remove remove.
Customer: Chalo car car set ko kariye.
Customer: Chalo.
Executive: Ab mujhe bataiye ki in dono category mein aap deal karte hain?
Customer: Ji nahi car mere bas only sir isme hi hai apna fabric car parking gazibo aur tentile.
Executive: Theek hai matlab ye jo abhi dono hataya in dono mein se kisi mein aap deal nahi karte correct na?
Customer: Kisi mein kisi mein deal nahi karte.
Executive: Ab neeche dekhiye exclude likha hai exclude.
Executive: E x c l u haan us pe click kariye.
Customer: Ye jo ye wala.
Executive: Haan ji haan ji yahan pe likhiye car shed.
Executive: Car shed.
Executive: Ab ye add karwa raha hun sir to car shed ki aani permanently band ho jayegi lead aapko theek hai?
Customer: Achcha car shed ki band ho jayegi?
Executive: Car shed ki band ho jayegi nahi chahiye na aapko?
Customer: Sir mere ko car parking ki chahiye car jo apan car parking dalte hain usko car shed bhi bolte hain.
Executive: Car shed car shed ke hi andar to car parking rehti hai sir ji ji ji.
Executive: To car shed mat kariye fir nahi to fir aapka gadbad ho jayega rehne dijiye back jaiye.
Customer: Back jaiye.
Executive: Back jaiye.
Executive: Ek step back hoiye ab neeche dekhiye na ek add product dikh raha hai sabse neeche last corner mein add product dikh raha hai back hoiye ek step back hoiye.
Executive: Ek step back hoiye.
Customer: Hello haan ek minute ek minute net slow hai aapka thoda upar neeche screen kariye.
Executive: Haan ek minute ek jyada kar diye thoda upar jaiye upar jaiye.
Executive: Bas bas bas ye last wala corner pe hai add product sabse last mein neeche neeche neeche.
Executive: Kone mein add product pe click kariye wahan pe.
Executive: Right right side right side mein bottom of the screen pe add product ka option hai wahan pe click kariye.
Customer: Sir idhar kuch nahi ho raha mere side se.
Customer: Apni taraf sir kuch nahi ho raha.
Customer: Sir idhar neeche dekhiye na car add product likha hua hai sir.
Customer: Sir wo baat sahi hai aapki fir main subah office ja ke phone karun jab?
Executive: Kya sir?
Customer: Subah office ja ke phone karun.
Executive: Kitna der lagega sir?
Customer: Ab to time lagega 7 baj jayenge.
Executive: Are nahi sir abhi abhi main bata deta hun ek baar ye dekhiye kya karna hai aapko theek hai na ye ye do cheez hai main karwa main apne side se kar dunga theek haan aapko kya karna hai yahan pe sir upar dekhiye upar recent likha hai R E C E N T isi page mein bas ek minute aur dunga upar dekhiye recent R E C E N T.
Customer: Recent ye jo haan ji haan ji haan ji haan ji upar upar mein upar mein upar mein ji ji haan sabse upar likha hai us pe click kariye.
Customer: Sir apni taraf se kuch nahi ho raha.
Executive: Haan meri taraf se kuch nahi ho raha sir.
Executive: Click karenge tab na hoga click hi nahi kiya sir recent likha hai R E C E N T us pe click kariye.
Customer: Sir main usi pe ungli maar raha hun kuch nahi ho raha sir.
Executive: Achcha achcha chaliye jo problem aa rahi thi na sir mota moti wo jo do edges the na wo aapke account pe add hi nahi the jiske chalte wo problem aa rahi thi theek hai na.
Customer: Achcha.
Executive: Haan baki ab ye aapko problem aani band ho jayegi theek hai sir aur koi problem ho to bataiye sir.
Customer: Theek hai sir sir okay.
Executive: Theek hai mera ek feedback jayega sir aapko ki mere regarding Manish aapko Manish ji ne call kiya tha ya nahi kiya tha aur support kiya nahi kiya ek baar feedback jarur dijiyega sir theek hai.
Customer: Haan ek dedh bola.
Executive: Theek hai sir okay thank you sir.
Executive: Aur Javed sir maine jo aapko whatsapp kiya na wo mera direct number hai us pe aap mujhe direct call karenge to mujhse hi aapki baat hogi okay okay nahi nahi call lage to mujhe message dal dijiyega main apne side se call kar lunga theek hai.
Customer: Okay okay.
Executive: Okay okay thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not receiving any buyleads or calls.

- Customer is unable to locate buylead preferences.



Resolution:

- Executive identified retractable roof issue.

- Executive guided customer to remove car shed.

- Executive offered a video meeting for screen sharing.

- Executive confirmed the issue was resolved.



Next Steps: 

- Executive requested feedback.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, correction, whatsapp, video meeting
